data.message: Hey Charisma Carpenter Man in it all the Rap Lord of a Legend Eminem the Prince of Existence aka The Heath Ja Marshal Tech N9ned Jordan...Its me Mat Hoffman's Step cousin Harrison Garrett..this is a some what private page I have...Please try to get in touch with Step Cousin Mat Hoffman with the rest of the celebrities...and call yourself along with your relatives and team member's along with their relative's and team member's...Each friend's of the Family..This make's it all easy to say Fast that we each are all primarily friend's of the Hope filled family! Also be very soft about the current Osama Bin Laden perspective's many are waking up to right now...Stories about the Public scene of thing's then what we all know from the behind the scene's perspective's of thing's...let this story right here be both behind the scene's and public story we all tell...Just ask Step cousin Mat Hoffman the Biking King on the Planet if this really was his STEP cousin's Facebook page...Once again I am Harrison Garrett Mat Hoffman's STEP cousin...Aunt Jane Garrett married Mat Hoffman Senior in the very early 90's...Mat and I have already worked this story out...his old number was 0353...This give's you a reason to be flipping me off...The Reason why I called your publicist up the other night was simply due to that I wanted to buy all your DVD's and CD's for about $250.00!

replies.message: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1102014178&ref=br_rs Just say you knew Aaron Perez through me....He is a FAN of each of you..He like's all the Rap Star's...He can keep up in the Rap Legend's community...Ask him to make a rap mix about Mat Hoffman the Biking Legend on the planet that is a STEP cousin in the Family!
